Headline: Update: No Trains O'Hare-bound Between Forest Park and Harlem (Forest Park Branch)
ShortDescription: Blue Line service partially resumed, remains suspended O'Hare-bound between Forest Park & Harlem (Forest Park Branch) due to track conditions.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Service on the Blue Line has partially resumed, but remains suspended O'Hare-bound between Forest Park and Harlem (Forest Park Branch) due to track conditions.

As a result, trains are operating as follows:

  • O'Hare-bound between O'Hare and Harlem (Forest Park Branch).
  • Normal service Forest Park-bound.

Shuttle buses are available between Harlem (Forest Park Branch) and Forest Park to provide connecting service.

See station personnel for further assistance, and pay attention to announcements on trains and at stations for service information.

We are working to restore service as quickly as possible. Allow extra travel time.
